name: Idle Car Tycoon: Idle games
description:
Do you like cars Do you like racing? Idle Car Tycoon is a fascinating place-based composition game! You need to continually merge cars to improve the quality of the cars, and place these cars on the track to earn coins for yourself, constantly buying and synthesizing them to finally merge into the coolest premium sports car.

How to play?
1. Merge cars to unlock dozens of cool cars;
2. Make money by racing;
3. Upgrade the level to unlock more parking spaces;

Game Features:
• Fun development, simulation operation.
• Place on-hook, puzzle leisure.
• There are more than 40 cars in the game. There are also some rare cars waiting for you to collect.
• Your car can automatically earn coins. Earn money even when you are offline.

Download Idle Auto Tycoon now, build a car company, and use your ingenuity to expand your business globally!
